QuestData.Title: If He Cannot Be Turned
QuestData.Description: Death knights, such as General Lightsbane, are held on too tight of a leash to be able to be turned from the Lich King's will except under the most extraordinary circumstances.$B$BThe general keeps himself within the vault overseeing the creation of new weapons. Disturb one of his weapon racks at the northern forge and I assure you, he will come. I'll send Vile, Lady Nightswood, and The Leaper in to help you.$B$BIf we are to finally own The Shadow Vault, General Lightsbane must fall!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat General Lightsbane and then report your success back to Koltira Deathweaver aboard the gunship, Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: General Lightsbane and his forces are defeated? The Shadow Vault is taken?
